title: Victoria Osteen - Appreciating Every Area of Your Life
itunes:title: Victoria Osteen - Appreciating Every Area of Your Life
description:
God has given all of us so much to be thankful for. It’s very easy to take things for granted but we can learn to honor God by appreciating the blessings he gives us. When we learn the language of appreciation we’ll see the true value of what we have in our lives.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
